content: I agree and stand behind your thoughts and knowledge, because in my life of expectations and dreams there has been confidence , let downs and people who speak negative to us. But in truth it is us who decide and choose the path we take. I have learned that in order to take on something you must believe you can do it and believe in what your doing. You also have to teach yourself every morning that you can do it. Be persistent, determined and follow through no matter how hot the coals get. Stay on your path and you will succeed. Thank you
